ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Re: Combining evolution with evolution (request for references)
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for your comments, JT and Ken! JT: Yes, NEAT contains a similar idea, as part of a rather complex algorithm. We re trying to boil it down to the bare
